results.title: Annie's Coming Out (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Don Murray, Film Australia and Gil Brealey
results.brief_description: A warm, moving film experience and a triumph of the human spirit. “Annie’s Coming Out” is based on the true story of Annie McDonald. Jessica Hathaway (Angela Punch McGregor) works at a hospital for handicapped children, and among her charges is Annie, a victim of cerebral palsy. Discovering Annie’s considerable intelligence, Jessica endeavours to prove this and must take her case to court in a battle against the establishment.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Don Murray, Film Australia and Gil Brealey

results.title: Annelids (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Bruce J. Russell, Modern Learning Aids and Biomedia Associates
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Inhabitants of the Planet Earth”.
A small anaesthetised earthworm is shown dissected, featuring the pumping heart. Shows peristaltic contractions which mix the food and send it along the intestinal tract. Undigested “castings” are expelled and their importance in soil ecology is discussed.

results.title: Annelid worms
results.brief_description: The following are studied: land earthworms, freshwater and saltwater aquatic worms; medicinal and pond leeches; numerous marine polchaet worms; and the most primitive type of annelid larva is illustrated by a study of the trochophore larva. No other credits available.

results.title: Annals of life
results.brief_description: Describes the evolution of life on earth from one- celled creatures to man. Fossil remains are used as illustration

results.title: Anna Who?
results.creator_credit: South Australian College of Advanced Education and Pip Karmel
results.brief_description: A film which dispels the myth that Anorexia Nervosa is a slimmers disease affecting only figure conscious women. Five young people (four women and one man) talk frankly about their experience of Anorexia and Bulimia, the factors in the cause and progress of the disease, and the road to recovery.

results.title: Anna [Italian version]
results.brief_description: Anna is the story of a young mother and her mentally handicapped son, Tom. The film traces the path followed by Anna in overcoming her distrust of professional health workers and outsiders. We follow Anna as she searches with increasing confidence, for the extra help that she is told is available to herself and young son Tom.
